name: Nickname not editable when attributes are set

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Nickname not editable when attributes are set
————————————————————————————
  1. Ensure LDAP first and last name attributes are set in System Console
  2. Log in as LDAP user
  3. Go to Account Settings ➜ First and last name ➜ Edit
inline.expectedResult: • Message appears "This field is handled through your login provider. If you want to change it, you need to do so through your login provider." and field is not editable
